IntroText: The college library is pretty empty at this hour.|It might be a quiet place to do your homework.
There's a few students in the library.|Who would you like to meet?
Hi girl.  (She looks at you and smirks.)|I guess you need help with an homework.
It's great to see you COMMON_PLAYERNAME.|I guess you need help with an homework.
Oh, it's you.  (She seems disappointed.)|I guess you need help with an homework.
Hi Miss COMMON_PLAYERNAME.|What brings you to the library?
I'm studying, it's not|a good time to talk.
It's great to see you again!|You're here for a homework?
Oh my god!  COMMON_PLAYERNAME!|Can you unlock the belt now?
This is very embarrassing.  I wasn't able|to remove your egg, can you help me?
(She giggles.)  Did you enjoy your|time in the locker this afternoon?
I can't believe you locked me|up in that locker this afternoon.
I still laugh when I think about what|happened to Miss Mildred this morning
Hello there.  So did you|enjoy your first day of school?
